vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) kor, a measure (usually dry)
1a) a dry or liquid measure equal to 10 ephahs or baths
1a1) a dry measure containing 6.25 bushels (220 l)
1a2) a liquid measure of 58 gallons (263 l)
Aramaic equivalent: kor (כּוֹר "kor" H3734B)
§ 1) kor, a measure (usually dry)
1a) a dry or liquid measure equal to 10 ephahs or baths
1a1) a dry measure containing 6.25 bushels (220 l)
1a2) a liquid measure of 58 gallons (263 l)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: coro; unidad de medida, tanto de líquidos como de áridos de aproximadamente 220 litros; equivalente a 1 homer
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition: 歌珥, 一個測量穀物的單位
vocabinfos._zh_Definition: 歌珥, 一个测量谷物的单位
